original_text: Because God wanted to make the unchanging nature of his purpose very clear to the heirs of what was promised, he confirmed it with an oath.
korean_text: 하나님은 약속을 기업으로 받는 자들에게 그 뜻이 변하지 아니함을 충분히 나타내시려고 그 일을 맹세로 보증하셨나니

sentences.original_text: the unchanging nature of his purpose very clear
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 목적의 불변하는 성격을 매우 명확하게

sentences.original_text: to the heirs of what was promised,
he confirmed it with an oath.
